message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $110.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $105. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering the product to you for $107.50.
I'm still interested in the product, but I can only go up to $106.25.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm still not willing to go as low as $106.25. I'm willing to make another concession, so I'm offering the product to you for $108.00.
